rules_text:
When this creature enters, cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this:You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
{2}{GU}, {T}, Sacrifice a Memory: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
notes:
!tokens Memory EIW
A value deck that ramps, draws cards, uses Cache synergy, and eventually wins with enormous finishers.
